Bibliography¶

When i developed the MapFragment, the following sites were a big help:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15098878/using-locationlistener-within-a-fragment http://michalu.eu/wordpress/android-mapfragment-nested-in-parent-fragment/ http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13728041/move-markers-in-google-map-v2-android https://blog.codecentric.de/en/2014/05/android-gps-positioning-location-strategies/

The DialogUtils class is taken from the quickblox sdk: com.quickblox.sample.location.activities.dialogutils

In general the example samples from the quickblox sdk were required in order to fulfill this project: http://quickblox.com/developers/Android
